scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin hunger.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/hunger.html && usemin sustainable-work.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/sustainable-work.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin hope-sports.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/hope-sports.html && usemin fish-farming.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/fish-farming.html && usemin donate.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/donate.html && usemin com-garden.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/com-garden.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
